description:
Luffy and Zoro put their strength to the ultimate test in a battle with a dragon. Meanwhile, a band of mysterious intruders make their gassy presence felt aboard the Sunny!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle in the Heat! Luffy vs. the Giant Dragon!
Shakunetsu no Tatakai! Luffy Tai Kyodai Ryuu!
Un combat chaud, chaud, chaud ! Luffy contre le dragon géant
¡Una abrasadora batalla! ¡Luffy contra el dragón gigante!
Жаркая битва! Луффи против Гигантского Дракона!
معركة مشتعلة! لوفي ضدّ التّنّين العملاق!
灼熱の戦い! ルフィVS[たい]巨大竜!
